original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase one ability score of your choice by 1, to a maximum of 30.

Peerless Aim. When you miss with an attack roll, you can hit instead. Once you use this benefit, you can’t use it again until the start of your next turn.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升Ability Score Increase。你使你选择的一项属性值提升1点，最多为30。

无双锁定Peerless Aim。当你的一次攻击检定未命中时，你可以改为命中。一旦你使用了该增益，直到你的下个回合开始时，都不能再次使用它。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase one ability score of your choice by 1, to a maximum of 30.

Blink Steps. Immediately after you take the Attack action or the Magic action, you can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升Ability Score Increase。你使你选择的一项属性值提升1点，最多为30。

闪烁步Blink Steps。当你执行攻击动作或魔法动作后，你可以立即传送至多30尺的距离到一处你可见的未被占据的空间内。

original: Immediately after you take the Attack action
translation: 在执行攻击动作后立即可用

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase one ability score of your choice by 1, to a maximum of 30.

Energy Resistances. You gain Resistance to two of the following damage types of your choice: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, Necrotic, Poison, Psychic, Radiant, or Thunder. Whenever you finish a Long Rest, you can change your choices.

Energy Redirection. When you take damage of one of the types chosen for the Energy Resistances benefit, you can take a Reaction to direct damage of the same type toward another creature you can see within 60 feet of yourself that isn’t behind &Reference[Total Cover]. If you do so, that creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 plus your Constitution modifier and Proficiency Bonus) or take damage equal to 2d12 plus your Constitution modifier.

Foundry Note

The Choose Resistances activity includes an Active Effect for each Resistance that you can apply to yourself. When choosing new Resistances be sure to delete or disable the previously selected Active Effects in the 'Effects" tab of your sheet.

The Energy Redirection reaction activity includes a save and you can choose the damage type in the damage roll's dialog box.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升Ability Score Increase。你使你选择的一项属性值提升1点，最多为30。

能量抗性Energy Resistances。你从下列伤害类型中选择两种获得抗性：强酸、寒冷、火焰、闪电、暗蚀、毒素、心灵、光耀或雷鸣。当你完成一次长休时，你可以改变你的选择。

能量重导Energy Redirection。当你受到你能量抗性增益中选择的类型的伤害时，你可以执行一个反应来将相同类型的伤害直接施加给位于你60尺内的你可见的另一名生物（它对你而言不能处于全掩护下），若你如此做，该生物需要通过一次敏捷豁免（DC等于8+你的体质调整值+你的熟练加值），否则受到2d12+你的体质调整值点伤害。

Foundry贴士

选择抗性行动的每一种抗性都有一个对应的效果，你可以将其应用到角色身上。选择新的抗性时，请确保删除或禁用“效果”选项卡中之前选择的效果。

能量重导反应包括一个豁免，你可以在伤害的掷骰对话框中选择伤害类型。

original: Whenever you finish a Long Rest
translation: 当你完成一次长休之后

key: entries->Boon of Energy Resistance->effects->Acid: Boon of Energy Resistance->name
entries->Boon of Energy Resistance->effects->Cold: Boon of Energy Resistance->name
entries->Boon of Energy Resistance->effects->Fire: Boon of Energy Resistance->name
entries->Boon of Energy Resistance->effects->Lightning: Boon of Energy Resistance->name
entries->Boon of Energy Resistance->effects->Necrotic: Boon of Energy Resistance->name
entries->Boon of Energy Resistance->effects->Poison: Boon of Energy Resistance->name
entries->Boon of Energy Resistance->effects->Psychic: Boon of Energy Resistance->name
entries->Boon of Energy Resistance->effects->Radiant: Boon of Energy Resistance->name
entries->Boon of Energy Resistance->effects->Thunder: Boon of Energy Resistance->name

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase one ability score of your choice by 1, to a maximum of 30.

Improve Fate. When you or another creature within 60 feet of you succeeds on or fails a D20 Test, you can roll 2d4 and apply the total rolled as a bonus or penalty to the d20 roll. Once you use this benefit, you can’t use it again until you roll Initiative or finish a Short or Long Rest.

Foundry Note

The Improve Fate activity includes a roll and automatically restores a use after a Short or Long Rest. It does not automatically refresh after you roll Initiative though.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升Ability Score Increase。你使你选择的一项属性值提升1点，最多为30。

时来运转Improve Fate。当你或位于你60尺内的另一名生物在一次D20检定中成功或失败时，你可以骰2d4，并将掷骰结果作为加值或减值附加到d20的骰值中。一旦你使用了该增益，直到你投掷先攻或完成一次短休或长休时，都不能再次使用它。

Foundry贴士

时来运转行动包括一个掷骰，并在短休或长休后自动恢复使用次数。但掷先攻并不会自动刷新。

original: When you or another creature within 60 feet of you succeeds or fails a D20 Test
translation: 当你或另一个60尺内的生物于一次D20检定中成功或失败时

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase one ability score of your choice by 1, to a maximum of 30.

Fortified Health. Your Hit Point maximum increases by 40. In addition, whenever you regain Hit Points, you can regain additional Hit Points equal to your Constitution modifier (currently [[lookup @abilities.con.mod]]). Once you’ve regained these additional Hit Points, you can’t do so again until the start of your next turn.

Foundry Note

This feat includes an Active Effect which will automatically apply the bonus to your maximum HP.

The Fortify Health activity includes the additional healing.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升Ability Score Increase。你使你选择的一项属性值提升1点，最多为30。

身强体壮Fortified Health。你的生命值上限增加40。此外，每当你恢复生命值时，你可以恢复等于你体质调整值 ([[@abilities.con.mod]])的额外生命值。一旦你以此恢复了额外生命值，直到你的下个回合开始时，都不能再如此做。

Foundry贴士

该专长包括一个会自动将加值应用到你的最大HP上的被动效果。

身强体壮行动包含附加的治疗效果。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Strength or Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 30.

Overcome Defenses. The Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage you deal always ignores Resistance.

Overwhelming Strike. When you roll a 20 on the d20 for an attack roll, you can deal extra damage to the target equal to the ability score increased by this feat. The extra damage’s type is the same as the attack’s type.

Foundry Note

This feat's effects are not automated. The additional damage can be added in the Situational Bonus field of the damage's dialog roll box.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升Ability Score Increase。你使你选择的一项属性值（力量或敏捷）提升1点，最多为30。

摧坚破甲Overcome Defenses。你造成的钝击、挥砍和穿刺伤害无视抗性。

无阻打击Overwhelming Strike。当你为一次攻击检定投掷的d20骰出了20时，你可以对目标造成额外伤害，你造成的额外伤害等于你以此专长提升的属性的属性值，伤害类型与这次攻击的伤害类型相同。

Foundry贴士

这个专长的效果没有自动化。可以使用伤害掷骰对话框中的环境加值来附加伤害。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase one ability score of your choice by 1, to a maximum of 30.

Last Stand. When you would be reduced to 0 Hit Points, you can drop to 1 Hit Point instead and regain a number of Hit Points equal to half your Hit Point maximum. Once you use this benefit, you can’t use it again until you finish a Long Rest.

Recover Vitality. You have a pool of ten d10s. As a Bonus Action, you can expend dice from the pool, roll those dice, and regain a number of Hit Points equal to the roll’s total. You regain all the expended dice when you finish a Long Rest.

Foundry Note

The Last Stand activity has one free use per Long Rest and grants half of your Hit Point maximum in healing.

The Recover Vitality activity has 10 free uses per Long Rest representing your pool of d10s. You can select the number you would like to use and the healing formula will automatically update.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升Ability Score Increase。你使你选择的一项属性值提升1点，最多为30。

背水一战Last Stand。当你的生命值将要降至0时，你可以改为降至1并恢复等于你生命值上限一半的生命值。一旦你使用了该增益，直到你完成一次长休时，都不能再次使用它。

重获生机Recover Vitality。你获得一个有着10枚d10的治疗池。以一个附赠动作，你可以消耗治疗池中任意枚骰子来恢复你的生命值。投掷全部你消耗的骰子，将它们相加，即是你以此恢复的生命值。当你完成一次长休时，你的治疗池重获所有被消耗的骰子。

Foundry贴士

背水一战 在每次长休前可以使用1次，并可获得HP上限一半的治疗效果。

重获生机在每次长休前可以使用10次，代表你的治疗骰池。你可以选择要使用的次数，治疗公式会自动更新。

original: When you would be reduced to 0 Hit Points
translation: 当你的生命值会减至0时

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase one ability score of your choice by 1, to a maximum of 30.

All-Around Adept. You gain proficiency in all skills.

Expertise. Choose one skill in which you lack Expertise. You gain Expertise in that skill.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升Ability Score Increase。你使你选择的一项属性值提升1点，最多为30。

全能专家All-Around Adept。你获得所有技能的熟练。

专精Expertise。选择一项你没有专精的技能，你获得该技能的专精。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase one ability score of your choice by 1, to a maximum of 30.

Escape Artist. As a Bonus Action, you can take the &Reference[Disengage] action, which also ends the Grappled condition on you.

Quickness. Your Speed increases by 30 feet.

Foundry Note

This feat includes an Active Effect which automatically increases your Speed.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升Ability Score Increase。你使你选择的一项属性值提升1点，最多为30。

逃脱艺术Escape Artist。作为一个附赠动作，你可以执行 &Reference[Disengage] 动作并结束一切作用于你的擒抱状态。

风驰电掣Quickness。你的速度增加30尺。

Foundry贴士

此专长包含一个会自动提升你速度的被动效应。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma score by 1, to a maximum of 30.

Free Casting. Whenever you cast a spell with a level 1–4 spell slot, roll [[/r 1d4]]. If the number you roll is the same as the slot’s level, the slot isn’t expended.

Foundry Note

If the number is the same, uncheck the Consumption option when using the spell.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升Ability Score Increase。你的智力、感知或魅力提升1点，最多为30。

免费施法Free Casting。每当你使用一环到四环的法术位施展法术时，投掷[[/r 1d4]]。若掷骰结果与你消耗的法术位一致，则该法术位不会被消耗。

Foundry贴士

如果数字相同，使用法术时请自行选择‘不消耗法术位’。

key: entries->Boon of Spell Recall->activities->Free Cast Roll->name
entries->Boon of Spell Recall->activities->Free Cast Roll->roll
entries->Boon of Spell Recall->activities->Free Cast Roll->condition
original: Whenever you cast a spell with a level 1-4 spell slot
translation: 当你消耗一个1-4环法术位释放法术时

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase one ability score of your choice by 1, to a maximum of 30.

Truesight. You have Truesight with a range of 60 feet.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which grants you Truesight with a range of 60 feet.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升Ability Score Increase。你使你选择的一项属性值提升1点，最多为30。

真实视觉Truesight。你具有60尺真实视觉。

Foundry贴士

该专长包括一个能让你拥有60尺真实视觉的被动效应。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase one ability score of your choice by 1, to a maximum of 30.

Merge with Shadows. While within Dim Light or Darkness, you can give yourself the &Reference[Invisible] condition as a Bonus Action. The condition ends on you immediately after you take an action, a Bonus Action, or a Reaction.

Shadowy Form. While within Dim Light or Darkness, you have Resistance to all damage except Psychic and Radiant.

Foundry Note

This feature's Boon of the Night Spirit Active Effect includes the Resistances but must be toggled on/off in the Effects tab of your sheet.

The Merge with Shadows activity includes an Active Effect that applies the Invisible condition.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升Ability Score Increase。你使你选择的一项属性值提升1点，最多为30。

融身入影Merge with Shadows。身处微光光照或黑暗期间，你可以以一个附赠动作令你获得 &Reference[Invisible] 状态。隐形状态将在你执行一个动作、附赠动作或反应后立即结束。

幽影化身Shadowy Form。身处微光光照或黑暗期间，你具有除心灵和光耀伤害外所有伤害的抗性。

Foundry贴士

暗夜精魂之恩惠包括了抗性，但你必须在自己角色卡的‘效应’一栏自行勾选或取消。

融身入影实现了隐形状态的自动化。

key: entries->Boon of the Night Spirit->activities->Merge with the Shadows->name
entries->Boon of the Night Spirit->effects->Boon of the Night Spirit->name
entries->Boon of the Night Spirit->effects->Merged with Shadows->name

original:
(Prerequisite: Fighting Style Feature)

You gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls you make with Ranged weapons.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which adds the bonus to Ranged weapon attack rolls.
translation:
(先决：战斗风格特性)

你使用远程武器进行的攻击检定获得+2加值。

Foundry贴士

该专长包含一个会增加远程武器攻击检定加值的效应。

original: You learn two @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.SkHptN2PTzFGDaEj#cantrip]{Cleric cantrips} of your choice. @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGuidance00]{Guidance} and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSacredFlam]{Sacred Flame} are recommended. The chosen cantrips count as Paladin spells for you, and Charisma is your spellcasting ability for them. Whenever you gain a Paladin level, you can replace one of these cantrips with another Cleric cantrip.
translation: 你学到两个自选的@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.SkHptN2PTzFGDaEj#cantrip]{牧师戏法}。推荐选择@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGuidance00]{神导术} and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplSacredFlam]{圣火术}。所选戏法对你而言相当于圣武士法术，施法主属性为魅力。当你获得一个圣武士等级时，你可以将其中一个戏法替换为另一个牧师戏法。

original:
(Prerequisite: Fighting Style Feature)

You have Blindsight with a range of 10 feet.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect that grants the Blindsight.
translation:
(先决：战斗风格特性)

你获得10尺距离的盲视。

Foundry贴士

该专长包含一个让角色获得盲视的被动效应。

original:
(Prerequisite: Fighting Style Feature)

While you’re wearing Light, Medium, or Heavy armor, you gain a +1 bonus to Armor Class.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which provides the Armor Class bonus. Disable it when you are not wearing armor.
translation:
(先决：战斗风格特性)

当你着装轻甲、中甲或重甲时，你的护甲等级获得+1加值。

Foundry贴士

该专长包含一个会提升你AC的被动效应。当你没有穿护甲时，请取消它。

original: You learn two @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.LhvuDQEyrCdg5EfU]{Druid cantrips} of your choice. @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGuidance00]{Guidance} and @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplStarryWisp]{Starry Wisp} are recommended. The chosen cantrips count as Ranger spells for you, and Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for them. Whenever you gain a Ranger level, you can replace one of these cantrips with another Druid cantrip.
translation: 你可以自选两个 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.LhvuDQEyrCdg5EfU]{德鲁伊戏法}。推荐选取@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplGuidance00]{神导术} 和 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplStarryWisp]{点点星芒} 。它们对你视作游侠法术，感知是你施展他们的施法关键属性。当你升级时，你可以将其中一个戏法替换为德鲁伊法术列表中的另一个戏法。

original:
(Prerequisite: Fighting Style Feature)

When you’re holding a Melee weapon in one hand and no other weapons, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with that weapon.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which provides the bonus. Disable it when you are wielding multiple weapons.
translation:
(先决：战斗风格特性)

当你单手持用一把近战武器，且也没有持用其他武器时，你使用那把武器进行的伤害掷骰获得+2加值。

Foundry贴士

该特性包含一个提升伤害加值的被动效应。当你装备多个武器时，请关掉它。

original:
(Prerequisite: Fighting Style Feature)

When you roll damage for an attack you make with a Melee weapon that you are holding with two hands, you can treat any 1 or 2 on a damage die as a 3. The weapon must have the Two-Handed or Versatile property to gain this benefit.

Foundry Note

This effect is not automated.
translation:
(先决：战斗风格特性)

当你发动了一次攻击并为其造成的伤害进行掷骰时，如果这次攻击是由一把双手持用的近战武器发动的，你可以将伤害骰中的任何1和2都视作3。但这把武器必须拥有双手或多用词条才能享受这个增益。

Foundry Note

该效应没有自动化。

original:
(Prerequisite: Fighting Style Feature)

When a creature you can see hits another creature within 5 feet of you with an attack roll, you can take a Reaction to reduce the damage dealt to the target by 1d10 plus your Proficiency Bonus. You must be holding a Shield or a Simple or Martial weapon to use this Reaction.

Foundry Note

The Intercept activity can be used to heal the correct amount of damage.
translation:
(先决：战斗风格特性)

当一个你能看见的生物通过攻击检定命中了一个位于你5尺内的另一个生物，你可以执行一个反应，将本次攻击对那个目标的伤害降低1d10+你的熟练调整值。你必须正持用着一面盾牌或者一把简易或军用武器才能使用这个反应。

Foundry Note

拦截等价于治疗相同的数值。

original: When a creature you can see hits another creature within 5 feet of you with an attack roll
translation: 当一个你能看见的生物用攻击检定命中你5尺内的生物时

original:
(Prerequisite: Fighting Style Feature)

When a creature you can see attacks a target other than you that is within 5 feet of you, you can take a Reaction to interpose your Shield if you’re holding one. You impose Disadvantage on the triggering attack roll and all other attack rolls against the target until the start of your next turn if you remain within 5 feet of the target.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect for tracking the protected creature but it does not automate the Disadvantage.
translation:
(先决：战斗风格特性)

当一个你能看见的生物攻击了一个位于你5尺内的除你以外的生物，如果你整持用这一面盾牌，你可以执行一个反应，将你的盾牌挡在其面前。你对触发了这一行动的攻击检定施加劣势，并且只要你还处于守护的目标5尺内，此后对该目标进行的所有其他攻击检定都将具有劣势，直到你的下一回合开始为止。

Foundry贴士

专长包含一个能跟踪被保护生物的效应，但未自动化劣势。

original: When a creature you can see attacks a target other than you within 5 feet of you
translation: 当一个你能看见的生物攻击了一个你5尺内的除你以外的生物

original:
(Prerequisite: Fighting Style Feature)

When you hit with a ranged attack roll using a weapon that has the Thrown property, you gain a +2 bonus to the damage roll.

Foundry Note

This feature is not automated. You can add +2 in the Situational Bonus field of the damage roll.
translation:
(先决：战斗风格特性)

当你使用一把具有投掷属性的武器进行远程攻击检定并命中时，你在该次伤害掷骰中获得+2加值。

Foundry贴士

该专长未被自动化。你可以在伤害掷骰对话框中的环境加值上+2。

original:
(Prerequisite: Fighting Style Feature)

When you make an extra attack as a result of using a weapon that has the Light property, you can add your ability modifier to the damage of that attack if you aren’t already adding it to the damage.

Foundry Note

This feature is not automated. You can add your modifier in the Situational Bonus field of the damage roll.
translation:
(先决：战斗风格特性)

当你因使用具有轻型词条的武器而得以发动追加攻击时，如果这次追加攻击的伤害并未已经加入你的属性调整值，你可以加入你的属性调整值。

Foundry贴士

该特性并未自动化。在伤害掷骰对话框中使用环境加值来添加伤害加值。

original:
(Prerequisite: Fighting Style Feature)

When you hit with your Unarmed Strike and deal damage, you can deal Bludgeoning damage equal to 1d6 plus your Strength modifier instead of the normal damage of an Unarmed Strike. If you aren’t holding any weapons or a Shield when you make the attack roll, the d6 becomes a d8.

At the start of each of your turns, you can deal 1d4 Bludgeoning damage to one creature &Reference[Grappled] by you.

Foundry Note

The Unarmed Strike (Weapon in Hand) activity can be used in place of your normal Unarmed Strike.

The Unarmed Strike (Empty Hand) activity includes the increased damage.

The Grappled Damage activity includes the damage roll.
translation:
(先决：战斗风格特性)

当你使用徒手打击命中并造成了伤害时，你可以造成1d6+你的力量调整值的钝击伤害，而不是原本的徒手打击伤害。如果你进行攻击检定时并没有持用任何武器或者盾牌，这个d6改为d8。

每次在你的回合开始时，你还可以对一个被你 &Reference[Grappled] 的生物造成1d4点钝击伤害。

Foundry 贴士

徒手打击(持用武器)可以用于替代普通的徒手打击。

徒手打击(空手)伤害提升。

擒抱伤害包含伤害掷骰。

original: At the start of each of your turns

General Feat (Prerequisite: Level 4+)

Increase one ability score of your choice by 2, or increase two ability scores of your choice by 1. This feat can’t increase an ability score above 20.

Repeatable. You can take this feat more than once.
translation:
通用专长 (先决：等级4+)

你使你选择的一项属性值提升2点，或使你选择的两项属性值提升1点。你无法以本专长将属性值提升超过20。

复选Repeatable。你可多次选择本专长。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Charisma score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Impersonation.While you’re disguised as a real or fictional person, you have Advantage on Charisma (Deception or Performance) checks to convince others that you are that person.

Mimicry. You can mimic the sounds of other creatures, including speech. A creature that hears the mimicry must succeed on a Wisdom (Insight) check to determine the effect is faked (DC 8 plus your Charisma modifier and Proficiency Bonus).

Foundry Note

The Mimicry activity includes a check with the correct DC.

This feat does not automate the Advantage on checks.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升Ability Score Increase。你的魅力提升1，最多为20。

伪装Impersonation。当你伪装成一个虚拟或真实的个体期间，你在说服别人相信你就是那位个体的魅力（欺瞒或表演）检定上具有优势。

拟声Mimicry。你可以模仿另一个生物的声音，包括说话方式。听见你的拟声的生物必须通过一次感知（洞悉）检定来判断声音是否是伪造的（DC等于8+你的魅力调整值+你的熟练加值）。

Foundry贴士

拟声包含一个拥有正确DC的检定。

该专长并不会让检定自动获得优势。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Initiative Proficiency. When you roll Initiative, you can add your Proficiency Bonus to the roll.

Initiative Swap. Immediately after you roll Initiative, you can swap your Initiative with the Initiative of one willing ally in the same combat. You can’t make this swap if you or the ally has the &Reference[Incapacitated] condition.

Foundry Note

This feature automatically includes the bonus to your Initiative.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

先攻熟练Initiative Proficiency。当你投掷先攻时，你可以将你的熟练加值加入结果。

先攻互换Initiative Swap。当你掷完先攻，你可以立即与处于同一场战斗中的一名自愿的盟友交换先攻。如果你或那个盟友正处于 &Reference[Incapacitated]状态，则不能进行交换。

Foundry贴士

该特性自动为你的先攻提供加值。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Strength or Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Climb Speed. You gain a Climb Speed equal to your Speed.

Hop Up. When you have the &Reference[Prone] condition, you can right yourself with only 5 feet of movement.

Jumping. You can make a running &Reference[Long Jump]{Long} or &Reference[High Jump] after moving only 5 feet.

Foundry Note

This feat does not automate the effects. You can add your Climb Speed by toggling the "Edit" mode of your sheet and clicking on the "Gear" icon above "Walk" (Just above your Hit Point bar).
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升Ability Score Increase。你的力量、敏捷或体质提升1，最多为20。

攀爬速度Climb Speed。你获得等同于你速度的攀爬速度。

鲤鱼打挺Hop Up。当你 &Reference[Prone] 时，你可以仅花5尺移动力来站起来。

跳跃Jumping。你只需移动5尺就可进行助跑的 &Reference[Long Jump]{跳远} 或 &Reference[跳高]。

Foundry贴士

该专长没有自动化。你需要自行添加攀爬速度，请打开角色卡的‘编辑’模式并且点击‘行走速度’上面的齿轮图标（就在生命栏上面）。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Strength or Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Improved Dash. When you take the &Reference[Dash] action, your Speed increases by 10 feet for that action.

Charge Attack. If you move at least 10 feet in a straight line toward a target immediately before hitting it with a melee attack roll as part of the Attack action, choose one of the following effects: gain a 1d8 bonus to the attack’s damage roll, or push the target up to 10 feet away if it is no more than one size larger than you. You can use this benefit only once on each of your turns.

Foundry Note

You can either add the 1d8 to your attack's damage roll dialog box as a Situational Bonus or use the Charge Attack activity and select the type of damage in the roll's dialog box.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你的力量或敏捷提升1，最多为20。

进阶疾走。当你执行 &Reference[Dash] 动作时，对该动作而言，你的速度增长了10尺。

冲锋攻击。若你在用攻击动作中的一次近战攻击检定命中一名目标前，向着该目标直线移动了至少10尺，你可以为这次攻击增添以下其中一个效果：此次攻击的伤害掷骰获得1d8的加值；或将目标推离10尺，前提是目标体型至多比你大一级。你只能在每个你自己的回合使用这个增益一次。

Foundry 贴士

你既可以在你的伤害掷骰对话框中添加1d8的环境加值，亦可以使用冲锋攻击行为然后在伤害掷骰对话框中选择伤害类型。

original: If you move at least 10 feete in a straight line immediately before hitting it with a melee attack
translation: 当你至少直线移动了10尺并立刻以近战攻击检定命中一个目标后

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Constitution or Wisdom score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Cook’s Utensils. You gain proficiency with @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtulCooksUtens]{Cook’s Utensils} if you don’t already have it.

Replenishing Meal. As part of a Short Rest, you can cook special food if you have ingredients and Cook’s Utensils on hand. You can prepare enough of this food for a number of creatures equal to 4 plus your Proficiency Bonus (currently [[4 + @prof]]). At the end of the Short Rest, any creature who eats the food and spends one or more Hit Dice to regain Hit Points regains an extra 1d8 Hit Points.

Bolstering Treats. With 1 hour of work or when you finish a Long Rest, you can cook a number of treats equal to your Proficiency Bonus if you have ingredients and Cook’s Utensils on hand. These special treats last 8 hours after being made. A creature can use a Bonus Action to eat one of those treats to gain a number of Temporary Hit Points equal to your Proficiency Bonus.

Foundry Note

The Replenishing Meal activity includes the healing.

The Bolstering Treats activity will restore a number of uses equal to your Proficiency Bonus. As creatures eat them you can use the Eat Treat activity to reduce the count or handle it manually.

This feat does not automatically add proficiency with Cook's Utensils. To add it, toggle on the "Edit" mode of your sheet, and below your Skills click on the Cog icon to add this proficiency.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你的体质或感知提升1，最多为20。

厨师工具。你获得 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtulCooksUtens]{厨师工具}的熟练项，如果你本身没有的话。

大补食膳。作为短休的一部分，只要你手上有食材和厨师工具，你就可以烹饪一顿特别的美食。你可以为数个生物准备足够的此类食物，其数量等于4+你的熟练加值(现在是 [[4 + @prof]])。在这一次短休结束时，任何吃了这些食物且花费了生命骰来恢复生命值的生物都能额外恢复1d8的生命值。

应急零嘴。如果你手上有食材和厨师工具，你可以花费一小时的时间，或在完成一次长休时，烹饪出一定份数的零嘴，其数量等于你熟练加值。这些特别的小零嘴在做好后能保持八小时。一个生物可以使用一个附赠动作来吃掉其中一份零嘴，获得等同于你熟练加值的临时生命值。

Foundry 贴士

大补食膳行为已经包含治疗。

应急零嘴行为会恢复你熟练加值的使用次数。当一个生物打算食用它们的时候，使用 食用零嘴 行为去减少使用次数或手动掷骰。

此特性未自动提供厨师工具的熟练项。想要添加的话，切换到人物卡的“编辑模式”，在你的技能一栏点击齿轮图标来添加熟练项。

original: As part of a Short Rest

You gain the following benefits.

Tool Proficiency. You gain proficiency with three different Artisan’s Tools of your choice from the Fast Crafting table.

Discount. Whenever you buy a nonmagical item, you receive a 20 percent discount on it.

Fast Crafting. When you finish a Long Rest, you can craft one piece of gear from the Fast Crafting table, provided you have the Artisan’s Tools associated with that item and have proficiency with those tools. The item lasts until you finish another Long Rest, at which point the item falls apart.

Fast Crafting
Artisan’s ToolsCrafted Gear

Foundry Note

This feature does not automatically grant the proficiency. You can toggle the "Edit" mode in the "Details" tab of your sheet and click on the cog next to "Tools" underneath your Skills to choose your tool proficiencies.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

工具熟练。你从快速制作表中选择三项不同的工匠工具并获得其熟练。

折扣。无论何时，每当你购买非魔法物品时，你获得20%的折扣。

快速制作。当你完成一次长休时，你可以制作一件快速制作栏中的装备。你必须拥有与该物品对应的工匠工具以及与这些工具对应的工具熟练才能尝试制作。造出的物品会持续存在到你下次完成长休，随后该物品解体坏损。

快速制作
工匠工具可制造的装备
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtulCarpenters]{木匠工具}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagLadder00000]{梯子}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagTorch000000]{火把}
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtulLeatherwor]{皮匠工具}Case, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagPouch000000]{小袋}
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtulMasonsTool]{石匠工具}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBlockandTac]{滑轮组}
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtulPottersToo]{陶匠工具}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagJug00000000]{壶}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagLamp0000000]{油灯}
@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbtulSmithsTool]{铁匠工具}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBallBearing]{滚珠}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagBucket00000]{桶}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagCaltrops000]{铁蒺藜}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagGrapplingHo]{爪钩}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.M8xM8BLK4tpUayEE]{铁壶}

Foundry 贴士

此特性未提供熟练项的自动化。你可以于角色卡的"详细"一栏切换至 “编辑”模式，点击技能栏下方的一系列“工具”的齿轮图标来添加熟练项。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Ignore Loading. You ignore the Loading property of the Hand Crossbow, Heavy Crossbow, and Light Crossbow (all called crossbows elsewhere in this feat). If you’re holding one of them, you can load a piece of ammunition into it even if you lack a free hand.

Firing in Melee. Being within 5 feet of an enemy doesn’t impose Disadvantage on your attack rolls with crossbows.

Dual Wielding. When you make the extra attack of the Light property, you can add your ability modifier to the damage of the extra attack if that attack is with a crossbow that has the Light property and you aren’t already adding that modifier to the damage.

Foundry Note

The additional damage for Dual Wielding is not automatically implemented but it can be added to the Situational Bonus in the normal damage roll's dialog box.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你的敏捷提升1，最多为20。

无视装填。你无视手弩、重弩和轻弩的装填词条（在这个专长里统称弩）。如果你正手持着一把弩，你即使没有空手也能够为它装填一发弹药。

抵近射击。你用弩进行的攻击检定不会因你在敌人的5尺内而具有劣势。

双持射击。当你发动由轻型词条所提供的追加攻击时，如果这次追加攻击是由一把具有轻型词条的弩所发动的，你就可以将你的属性调整值加入本次伤害中，前提是你没有已经将该属性调整值计入这次伤害。

Foundry 贴士

双持射击没有实现自动化，考虑使用伤害掷骰对话框中的环境加值进行代替。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Strength or Constitution score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Push. Once per turn, when you hit a creature with an attack that deals Bludgeoning damage, you can move it 5 feet to an unoccupied space if the target is no more than one size larger than you.

Enhanced Critical. When you score a Critical Hit that deals Bludgeoning damage to a creature, attack rolls against that creature have Advantage until the start of your next turn.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which can be used to track the Advantage though it does not automate it.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你的力量或体质提升1，最多为20。

推动。每回合一次，当你以造成钝击伤害的一次攻击命中了一个生物时，只要这个生物的体型至多比你大一级，你就能将它移动5尺，并且移动后的位置必须是一处未被占据的空间。

强化重击。当你对一个生物打出一次造成钝击伤害的重击后，此后对这个生物进行的攻击检定都会具有优势，直到你的下个回合开始为止。

Foundry 贴士

此特性包括一个可以用于追踪目标生物，用于进行优势攻击的效应，但没有实现自动化。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Parry. If you’re holding a Finesse weapon and another creature hits you with a melee attack, you can take a Reaction to add your Proficiency Bonus (currently, [[lookup @prof]]) to your Armor Class, potentially causing the attack to miss you. You gain this bonus to your AC against melee attacks until the start of your next turn.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which will increase your Armor Class.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你的敏捷提升1，最多为20。

招架。如果其他生物以一次近战攻击命中你时，你正握着一把灵巧武器，则你可以通过执行反应来将你的熟练加值 (现在[[使用@prof]]) 加入到你的护甲等级中，此举可能导致本次攻击变为未命中。此后，在面对近战攻击时，你的AC都将获得这个加值，直到你的下一回合开始为止。

Foundry 贴士

此特性包含一个会自动提升你AC的被动效应。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Strength or Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Enhanced Dual Wielding. When you take the Attack action on your turn and attack with a weapon that has the Light property, you can make one extra attack as a Bonus Action later on the same turn with a different weapon, which must be a Melee weapon that lacks the Two-Handed property. You don’t add your ability modifier to the extra attack’s damage unless that modifier is negative.

Quick Draw. You can draw or stow two weapons that lack the Two-Handed property when you would normally be able to draw or stow only one.

Foundry Note

The removal of your ability modifier is not automated. You can subtract it in the Situational Bonus field of the damage roll's dialog box.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你的力量或敏捷提升1，最多为20。

强化双持。 当你在自己的回合中执行了攻击动作，并使用具有轻型词条的武器发动了一次攻击后，你可以在同一回合中，以一个附赠动作发动一次追加攻击。这次追加攻击必须由另一把不具有双手词条的近战武器发动。追加攻击的伤害不加入你的属性调整值（除非该调整值为负数）。

快速拔刀。你可以在正常只能拔出或入鞘一把武器时，同时拔出或入鞘两把非双手武器。

Foundry 贴士

移除你属性调整值的部分并未自动化。你可以在环境加值中手动减去。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Constitution score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Defy Death. You have Advantage on Death Saving Throws.

Speedy Recovery. As a Bonus Action, you can expend one of your Hit Point Dice, roll the die, and regain a number of Hit Points equal to the roll.

Foundry Note

The Speedy Recovery (Largest Die) activity expends your largest available Hit Die and the (Smallest Die) activity expends the smallest available Hit Die (only important when multiclassing, otherwise the results are the same).
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你的体质提升1，最多为20。

悍不畏死。你在死亡豁免上具有优势。

高速恢复。作为一个附赠动作，你可以消耗并投掷一颗生命骰，来恢复与投掷结果相等的生命值。

Foundry 贴士

高速恢复(最大生命骰)行为会消费你最大的可用生命骰，(最小生命骰)行为会使用你最小的可用生命骰。 (只有在你有兼职的时候有用，否则这二者数值一样)。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Energy Mastery. Choose one of the following damage types: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Thunder. Spells you cast ignore Resistance to damage of the chosen type. In addition, when you roll damage for a spell you cast that deals damage of that type, you can treat any 1 on a damage die as a 2.

Repeatable. You can take this feat more than once, but you must choose a different damage type each time for Energy Mastery.

Foundry Note

The effects of this feat are not automated.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你的智力、感知或魅力提升1，最多为20。

能量掌控。选择以下伤害类型之一：强酸，寒冷，火焰，闪电或雷鸣。你施展的法术无视所选伤害类型的抗性。此外，当你为你施展的造成该类型伤害的法术投掷伤害时，你可以将伤害骰中的任何1都视为2。

复选。你可多次选择本专长，但你每次都必须为能量掌控选择一个不同的伤害类型。

Foundry 贴士

此专长效果未自动化。

original:
Your exposure to the Feywild’s magic grants you the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Fey Magic. Choose one level 1 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.dWVioXxEGjcPsI9Y]{spell} from the Divination or Enchantment school of magic. You always have that spell and the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMistyStep0]{Misty Step} spell prepared. You can cast each of these spells without expending a spell slot. Once you cast either spell in this way, you can’t cast that spell in this way again until you finish a Long Rest. You can also cast these spells using spell slots you have of the appropriate level. The spells’ spellcasting ability is the ability increased by this feat.

Foundry Note

The spells will have to be manually edited after being added to your sheet to configure the spellcasting ability and add the free use.
translation:
暴露在妖精荒野的魔法之下给予你了以下增益：

属性值提升。你的智力、感知或魅力提升1，最多为20。

妖精魔法。选择一道预言系或者惑控系的一环@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.dWVioXxEGjcPsI9Y]{法术}。你总是准备了你选的这道法术与@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMistyStep0]{迷踪步}。你可以在不消耗法术位的情况下施展这些法术各一次。当你以此法施展某道法术后，你不能再次以此法施展该法术，直至你完成一次长休。你也可以消耗合适的法术位来施展这些法术。这些法术的施法属性是你由此专长提升的属性。

Foundry 贴士

法术在添加到你的角色卡中后需要手动编辑，来修改施法主属性和添加免费使用次数。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Strength or Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Punch and Grab. When you hit a creature with an Unarmed Strike as part of the Attack action on your turn, you can use both the Damage and the Grapple option. You can use this benefit only once per turn.

Attack Advantage. You have Advantage on attack rolls against a creature &Reference[Grappled] by you.

Fast Wrestler. You don't have to spend extra movement to move a creature by you if the creature is your size or smaller.

Foundry Note

The Advantage is not automated.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你的力量或敏捷提升1，最多为20。

连擒带打。你的回合中，当你用攻击动作中的一次徒手打击命中了一个生物，你可以同时进行擒抱和造成伤害两个选项。你每回合只能使用这个增益一次。

优势攻击。 你攻击被你&Reference[Grappled]的生物时的攻击检定具有优势。

高速拖行。 当你移动一个被你擒抱的生物时，如果这个生物的体型和你一致或比你更小，你的速度不会减半。

Foundry 贴士

优势未自动化。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Strength score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Heavy Weapon Mastery. When you hit a creature with a weapon that has the Heavy property as part of the Attack action on your turn, you can cause the weapon to deal extra damage to the target. The extra damage equals your Proficiency Bonus.

Hew. Immediately after you score a Critical Hit with a Melee weapon or reduce a creature to 0 Hit Points with one, you can make one attack with the same weapon as a Bonus Action.

Foundry Note

The Heavy Weapon Damage activity includes the additional damage.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你的力量提升1，最多为20。

重武器掌握。在你的回合内，如果你通过攻击动作中的攻击检定命中了一个生物，并且这次攻击检定是由具有重型标签的武器发动的，你就可以让这把武器对目标造成一定的额外伤害。其额外伤害等于你的熟练加值。

顺势斩。当你使用近战武器造成了一次重击或将一个生物的生命值降低至0时，你可以立即使用你的附赠动作来以相同的武器进行一次攻击。

Foundry 贴士

重武器伤害行为包含了附加伤害。

original: When you hit a creature with a weapon that has the Heavy property as part of the Attack action on your turn
translation: 作为攻击检定的一部分，你以一个具备熟练的重型武器于你的回合内命中了一个生物时

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Battle Medic. If you have a @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagHealersKit0]{Healer’s Kit}, you can expend one use of it and tend to a creature within 5 feet of yourself as a Utilize action. That creature can expend one of its Hit Point Dice, and you then roll that die. The creature regains a number of Hit Points equal to the roll plus your Proficiency Bonus.

Healing Rerolls. Whenever you roll a die to determine the number of Hit Points you restore with a spell or with this feat’s Battle Medic benefit, you can reroll the die if it rolls a 1, and you must use the new roll.

Foundry Note

The character expending their Hit Die can reduce it on their sheet and inform you of the hit die size. You can then use the Heal d6, d8, d10, or d12 activity to heal them. The activities automatically reroll 1's.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

战地医师。如果你有@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.equipment.Item.phbagHealersKit0]{医疗包}，你可以用一个利用动作并消耗医疗包的一次使用次数，护理一个位于你5尺内的生物。该生物可以消耗一个生命骰，然后由你来投掷它。该生物可以恢复一定的生命值，具体数值等于你所掷出的点数并额外加上你的熟练加值。

治疗重掷。当你掷骰以决定用法术或此专长的战地医师增益所恢复的生命值时，如果掷出1，你可以重掷一次，但必须使用重掷的结果。

Foundry 贴士

消耗生命骰的角色可以在自己的角色卡上减少生命骰然后告诉你其大小。你可以使用 治疗 d6，d8，d10，或 d12行为来治疗他们。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase.Increase your Constitution or Strength score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Armor Training. You gain training with Heavy armor.

Foundry Note

This feature automatically grants training with Heavy Armor.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你的体质或力量提升1，最多为20。

护甲受训。你获得重甲受训。

Foundry 贴士

此特性自动提供了重甲熟练项。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase.Increase your Constitution or Strength score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Damage Reduction. When you’re hit by an attack while you’re wearing Heavy armor, any Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage dealt to you by that attack is reduced by an amount equal to your Proficiency Bonus.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which automatically reduces those damage types by your Proficiency Bonus. Disable it when you are not wearing Heavy Armor.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你的体质或力量提升1，最多为20。

伤害减免。当你穿着重甲被一次攻击命中时，该次攻击对你造成的任何钝击、穿刺或挥砍伤害皆减去你的熟练加值。

Foundry 贴士

此特性包含一个以你熟练加值的值来自动减少相应类型伤害的被动效应。未穿戴重甲时请手动关闭该效果。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Wisdom or Charisma score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Bolstering Performance. When you finish a Short or Long Rest, you can give an inspiring performance: a speech, song, or dance. When you do so, choose up to six allies (which can include yourself) within 30 feet of yourself who witness the performance. The chosen creatures each gain Temporary Hit Points equal to your character level plus the modifier of the ability you increased with this feat.

Foundry Note

The Inspire with Wisdom and Inspire with Charisma activities can be used to provide Temporary Hit Points using the relevant ability.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你的感知或魅力提升1，最多为20。

激励演出。每当短休或长休结束时，你可以做一场激励人心的表演：演讲、歌曲或舞蹈。每当你这么做时，选择至多6个在周围30尺内观看表演的友好生物（可以包括你自己）。每个被选中的生物都可以获得一定临时生命值，其数值等于你的角色等级+你用本专长增加的属性的调整值。

Foundry 贴士

以感知激励 和 以魅力激励 行为可以让你使用对应属性提供临时生命值。

original: When you finish a Short or Long Rest
translation: 当你完成一次短休或长休

original: When you finish a Short or Long Rest
translation: 当你完成一次短休或长休

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Intelligence score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Lore Knowledge. Choose one of the following skills: Arcana, History, Investigation, Nature, or Religion. If you lack proficiency in the chosen skill, you gain proficiency in it, and if you already have proficiency in it, you gain Expertise in it.

Quick Study. You can take the Study action as a Bonus Action.

Foundry Note

This feature does not automatically grant the proficiency/Expertise. You can toggle the "Edit" mode for your sheet and click on the circle next to the skill to apply proficiency or Expertise as needed.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你的智力提升1，最多为20。

轶闻知识。选择下列技能之一：奥秘，历史，调查，自然或宗教。如果你不具有所选技能的熟练，则你获得熟练；如果你已有熟练，则你获得其专精。

快速研究。你可以用附赠动作进行研究动作。

Foundry 贴士

此特性没有自动提供熟练和专精。你可以切换角色卡的“编辑”模式，点击技能旁的圆点，来应用所需的熟练和专精。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Strength or Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Armor Training. You gain training with Light armor and Shields.

Foundry Note

This feature automatically provides training with Light armor and Shields.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你的力量或敏捷提升1，最多为20。

护甲受训。你获得轻甲和盾牌受训。

Foundry 贴士

此特性自动提供了轻甲和盾牌熟练。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Luck Points. You have a number of Luck Points equal to your Proficiency Bonus and can spend the points on the benefits below. You regain your expended Luck Points when you finish a Long Rest.

Advantage. When you roll a d20 for a D20 Test, you can spend 1 Luck Point to give yourself Advantage on the roll.

Disadvantage. When a creature rolls a d20 for an attack roll against you, you can spend 1 Luck Point to impose Disadvantage on that roll.

Foundry Note

This feature includes the appropriate number of uses and scales as you level up.

The Advantage and Disadvantage activities expend a use but do not enforce the Advantage/Disadvantage.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

幸运点。你拥有一些幸运点，其数量等同于你的熟练加值。你可以将点数花在下列的增益上。你在完成一次长休时重新获得所有已消耗的幸运点。

优势。当你为了一次D20检定而投掷d20时，你可以花费一个幸运点来给予这次检定优势。

劣势。当一个生物为了一次对你发动的攻击检定而投掷d20时，你可以花费一个幸运点来为这次检定施加劣势。

Foundry 贴士

此特性包括一个正确的使用次数，随着你的等级提升而提升。

优势 和 劣势 行为消耗使用次数，但不执行优势/劣势。

original: When you roll a d20 for a D20 Test
translation: 当你为一次D20检定掷一个d20

original: When a creature rolls a d20 for an attack roll against you
translation: 当一个生物为攻击你而掷一个d20

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Strength or Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Concentration Breaker. When you damage a creature that is concentrating, it has Disadvantage on the saving throw it makes to maintain Concentration.

Guarded Mind. If you fail an Intelligence, a Wisdom, or a Charisma saving throw, you can cause yourself to succeed instead. Once you use this benefit, you can’t use it again until you finish a Short or Long Rest.

Foundry Note

The Guard Mind activity expends the free use of this feature which is recovered after a Short or Long Rest.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你的力量或敏捷提升1，最多为20。

专注中断手。当你对一名正处于专注中的生物造成伤害时，该生物进行维持本次专注的豁免检定时具有劣势。

武装头脑。当你的智力、感知或魅力豁免失败时，你可以将其改为成功。一旦你使用了这个增益，直到完成一次短休或长休前你都不能再使用它。

Foundry 贴士

武装头脑 会花费此特性的使用次数，其在一次短休或长休后恢复。

original: When you fail an Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma saving throw
translation: 当你于一次智力，感知或魅力豁免中失败时

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Two Cantrips. You learn two cantrips of your choice from the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.SkHptN2PTzFGDaEj]{Cleric}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.LhvuDQEyrCdg5EfU]{Druid}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.6AnqLUowgdsqMFvz]{Wizard} spell list. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this feat’s spells (choose when you select this feat).

Level 1 Spell. Choose a level 1 spell from the same list you selected for this feat’s cantrips. You always have that spell prepared. You can cast it once without a spell slot, and you regain the ability to cast it in that way when you finish a Long Rest. You can also cast the spell using any spell slots you have.

Spell Change. Whenever you gain a new level, you can replace one of the spells you chose for this feat with a different spell of the same level from the chosen spell list.

Repeatable. You can take this feat more than once, but you must choose a different spell list each time.

Foundry Note

The spells have to be added to your sheet with the above changes manually.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

两道戏法。 你从 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.SkHptN2PTzFGDaEj]{牧师}、@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.LhvuDQEyrCdg5EfU]{德鲁伊}或@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.content.JournalEntry.phbSpells0000000.JournalEntryPage.6AnqLUowgdsqMFvz]{法师}的法术列表中选择两道戏法。你从这个专长中习得的法术使用智力、感知或魅力作为施法关键属性（当你选择专长时选择属性）。

一环法术。你选择一道一环法术，并始终准备了这道法术。这道法术所属的法术列表，必须与你通过本专长习得的戏法相同。你可以不花任何法术位地施展它一次，并且当你完成长休后，你将重新获得以这种方式施展该法术的能力。你也可以使用你拥有的任意法术位来施展这道法术。

改变法术。每当你获得一级新等级，你都能将通过本专长习得的一道法术替换为同法术列表中同等级的另一道法术。

复选。你可多次选择本专长，但是你每次都必须选择一个不同的法术列表。

Foundry 贴士

法术在添加到你的角色卡之后要手动修改上面提到的部分。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Strength or Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Weapon Proficiency. You gain proficiency with Martial weapons.

Foundry Note

This feature automatically grants you proficiency with Martial weapons.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你的力量或敏捷提升1，最多为20。

武器熟练。你获得军用武器熟练。

Foundry 贴士

此特性自动提供了军用武器熟练。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Strength or Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Dexterous Wearer. While you’re wearing Medium armor, you can add 3, rather than 2, to your AC if you have a Dexterity score of 16 or higher.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which grants a +1 to Armor Class. Disable it if your Dexterity is 15 or lower.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你的力量或敏捷提升1，最多为20。

灵敏着装。着装中甲时，若你的敏捷在16或以上，你的AC可以增加3点而非2点。

Foundry 贴士

此特性包含一个+1AC的被动效应。如果你的敏捷在15以下，关闭它。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Strength or Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Armor Training. You gain training with Medium armor.

Foundry Note

This feature automatically grants training with Medium armor.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你的力量或敏捷提升1，最多为20。

护甲受训。你获得中甲受训。

Foundry 贴士

此特性自动提供了中甲熟练。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Strength, Dexterity, or Wisdom score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Mounted Strike. While mounted, you have Advantage on attack rolls against any unmounted creature within 5 feet of your mount that is at least one size smaller than the mount.

Leap Aside. If your mount is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw and only half damage if it fails. For your mount to gain this benefit, you must be riding it, and neither of you can have the &Reference[Incapacitated] condition.

Veer. While mounted, you can force an attack that hits your mount to hit you instead if you don’t have the Incapacitated condition.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你的力量、敏捷或感知提升1，最多为20。

骑乘攻击。当你骑乘时，你对位于你坐骑5尺内，且体型比它至少小一级的未骑乘生物所进行的攻击检定具有优势。

躲开一边。当你的坐骑受某效应影响而需要进行敏捷豁免来减半伤害时，如果豁免成功则可以不承受伤害，豁免失败则只承受一半伤害。你必须骑乘着你的坐骑，且两者均未&Reference[Incapacitated]时，坐骑才能享有这个增益。

我身作盾。当你骑乘时，只要你没有陷入失能，你就可以强迫命中了你的坐骑的攻击转而命中你自己。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Instrument Training. You gain proficiency with three Musical Instruments of your choice.

Encouraging Song. As you finish a Short or Long Rest, you can play a song on a Musical Instrument with which you have proficiency and give Heroic Inspiration to allies who hear the song. The number of allies you can affect in this way equals your Proficiency Bonus (currently [[lookup @prof]]).

Foundry Note

This feature does not automatically grant the proficiencies. You can toggle the "Edit" mode in the "Details" tab of your sheet and click on the cog next to "Tools" underneath your Skills to choose your Musical Instrument proficiencies.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

乐器训练。你自选三项乐器，获得其熟练项。

鼓舞之歌。当你完成短休或长休后，你可以用你熟练的乐器演奏一首歌曲，并给予听到这首乐歌的盟友一个英雄激励。以这种方式所能影响的盟友数量，最多等于你的熟练加值 (现在 [[@prof]])。

Foundry 贴士

此特性没有自动提供熟练项。在角色卡的“详细” 一栏切换至编辑模式，点击技能下方的“工具”旁的齿轮图标来修改乐器的熟练项。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Intelligence or Wisdom score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Keen Observer. Choose one of the following skills: Insight, Investigation, or Perception. If you lack proficiency with the chosen skill, you gain proficiency in it, and if you already have proficiency in it, you gain Expertise in it.

Quick Search. You can take the Search action as a Bonus Action.

Foundry Note

This feature does not automatically grant the proficiency/Expertise. You can toggle the "Edit" mode for your sheet and click on the circle next to the skill to apply proficiency or Expertise as needed.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你的智力或感知提升1，最多为20。

敏锐观察。 选择以下技能之一：洞悉、调查或察觉。如果你不具有所选技能的熟练，则你获得熟练；如果你已有熟练，则你获得专精。

快速搜索。你可以用附赠动作进行搜索动作。

Foundry 贴士

此特性没有自动提供熟练和专精。在角色卡中切换为“编辑”模式，点击技能旁的圆点来应用所需的熟练和专精。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Strength or Dexterity by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Puncture. Once per turn, when you hit a creature with an attack that deals Piercing damage, you can reroll one of the attack’s damage dice, and you must use the new roll.

Enhanced Critical. When you score a Critical Hit that deals Piercing damage to a creature, you can roll one additional damage die when determining the extra Piercing damage the target takes.

Foundry Note

This feature's effects are not automated.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你的力量或敏捷提升1，最多为20。

穿透伤。每回合一次，当你用造成穿刺伤害的攻击命中一个生物时，你可以重投这次伤害的其中一个伤害骰。你必须使用新的结果。

强化重击。当你用造成穿刺伤害的攻击命中一个生物并且造成重击时，你可以在计算额外的穿刺伤害时多投一个伤害骰。

Foundry 贴士

尚未自动化。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Dexterity or Intelligence score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Potent Poison. When you make a damage roll that deals Poison damage, it ignores Resistance to Poison damage.

Brew Poison. You gain proficiency with the Poisoner’s Kit. With 1 hour of work using such a kit and expending 50 GP worth of materials, you can create a number of poison doses equal to your Proficiency Bonus. As a Bonus Action, you can apply a poison dose to a weapon or piece of ammunition. Once applied, the poison retains its potency for 1 minute or until you deal damage with the poisoned item, whichever is shorter. When a creature takes damage from the poisoned item, that creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw (DC 8 plus the modifier of the ability increased by this feat and your Proficiency Bonus) or take 2d8 Poison damage and have the Poisoned condition until the end of your next turn.

Foundry Note

The Create Poison Doses activity will restore a number of uses of this item according to your proficiency bonus.

The Apply Poison enchantment activity provides the option of a Dexterity or Intelligence save activity for the target item, which should be selected based on the ability score increased when this feat was chosen.

You may delete the Poison Save activity associated with the ability score not chosen for this feat.

Finally, the save DC for the enchantment activities is based on the weapon user's ability scores, but should always be compared to the save DC of this feature's owner.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你的敏捷或智力提升1，最多为20。

强效毒药。你造成毒素伤害的伤害掷骰无视目标的毒素伤害抗性。

酿毒。你获得毒药工具的熟练项。你可以花费一小时的时间与价值50GP的材料，来使用毒药工具制造一定数量的猛毒，其剂数等同于你的熟练加值。你可以以一个附赠动作为一把武器或一枚弹药涂上一剂猛毒。当被用于一把武器或一枚弹药后，猛毒的毒性持续一分钟或直至你用该武器或弹药攻击命中后。当一个生物受到来自这件涂毒武器或弹药的伤害后，该生物必须通过一次体质豁免（DC等于8+你以本专长提升的属性的调整值+你的熟练加值），否则将受到2d8毒素伤害并陷入中毒状态，直至你的下回合结束。

Foundry 贴士

创造毒剂行为将根据你的熟练加值恢复使用次数。

应用毒剂 为目标物品提供敏捷或智力豁免选项，根据选择此专长时增加的能力值进行选择。

你需要删除非你选择的属性的 毒素豁免 行为。

最后，附魔武器的豁免DC取决于武器使用者的能力值，但应始终与此专长拥有者的豁免DC比较。

original: When a creature takes damage from the poisoned item, that creature must succeed on a [[/save ability=con]] saving throw (DC 8 plus the modifier of the ability increased by this feat and your Proficiency Bonus) or take 2d8 Poison damage and have the &Reference[Poisoned] condition until the end of your next turn.
translation: 当一个生物受此涂毒物品伤害时， 其必须通过一个 [[/save ability=con]] 豁免骰 (DC 8+你以此专长提升的属性的调整值+你的熟练加值)否则受2d8毒素伤害并&Reference[Poisoned] 直到你下一回合结束。

original: When a creature takes damage from the poisoned item, that creature must succeed on a [[/save ability=con]] saving throw (DC 8 plus the modifier of the ability increased by this feat and your Proficiency Bonus) or take 2d8 Poison damage and have the &Reference[Poisoned] condition until the end of your next turn.
translation: 当一个生物受此涂毒物品伤害时， 其必须通过一个 [[/save ability=con]] 豁免骰 (DC 8+你以此专长提升的属性的调整值+你的熟练加值)否则受2d8毒素伤害并&Reference[Poisoned] 直到你下一回合结束。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Dexterity or Strength score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Pole Strike. Immediately after you take the Attack action and attack with a Quarterstaff, a Spear, or a weapon that has the Heavy and Reach properties, you can use a Bonus Action to make a melee attack with the opposite end of the weapon. The weapon deals Bludgeoning damage, and the weapon’s damage die for this attack is a d4.

Reactive Strike. While you’re holding a Quarterstaff, a Spear, or a weapon that has the Heavy and Reach properties, you can take a Reaction to make one melee attack against a creature that enters the reach you have with that weapon.

Foundry Note

The Pole Strike activity can be used for the Bonus Action attack and damage.

The Reactive Strike activity can be used if you're tracking Reaction usage.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你的敏捷或力量提升1，最多为20。

长柄打击。当你使用长棍、矛或同时有重型与触及属性的武器进行攻击动作时，可以用一个附赠动作以武器的另一端发动一次近战攻击。该武器在这次攻击中的伤害骰为d4，伤害类型为钝击伤害。

应激打击。当你持握长棍、矛或同时具有重型与触及属性的武器时，你可以使用反应对进入你触及范围的生物进行一次近战攻击。

Foundry 注

长柄打击行为可以用附赠动作进行攻击和伤害。

应激打击 可以使用，如果你需要跟踪反应的使用情况。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Choose one ability in which you lack saving throw proficiency. Increase the chosen ability score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Saving Throw Proficiency. You gain saving throw proficiency with the chosen ability.

Foundry Note

This feature does not automatically grant the saving throw proficiency. You can toggle the "Edit" mode for your sheet and click on the cog next to the ability score to enable the saving throw proficiency.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。选择一个你缺少豁免熟练项的属性，并使该属性提升1，最多为20。

豁免熟练。你获得所选属性的豁免熟练。

Foundry 注

未自动应用熟练项。你可以进入角色卡的“编辑”模式，点击属性值旁的齿轮按钮，启用对应豁免的熟练。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Ritual Spells. Choose a number of level 1 spells equal to your Proficiency Bonus (currently [[lookup @prof]]) that have the Ritual tag. You always have those spells prepared, and you can cast them with any spell slots you have. The spells’ spellcasting ability is the ability increased by this feat. Whenever your Proficiency Bonus increases thereafter, you can add an additional level 1 spell with the Ritual tag to the spells always prepared with this feature.

Quick Ritual. With this benefit, you can cast a Ritual spell that you have prepared using its regular casting time rather than the extended time for a Ritual. Doing so doesn’t require a spell slot. Once you cast the spell in this way, you can’t use this benefit again until you finish a Long Rest.

Foundry Note

The spells must be added manually with the changes.

The Quick Ritual activity can be used for tracking the limited use between Long Rests.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你的智力、感知或魅力提升1，最多为20。

仪式魔法。你选择数道具有仪式标签的一环法术，其具体数量等于你的熟练加值 (现在是 [[@prof]])。你总是准备了这几道法术，并可以用任何你拥有的法术位施展它们。施展它们的施法属性为你用此专长提升的属性。在这之后，每当你的熟练加值提升时，你可以通过这个特性多增加一道始终准备了的，带有仪式标签的一环法术。

快速仪式。 你可以用通常的施法时间来施展一道仪式法术，而不需要仪式的延长施法时间。这么做不会花费你的法术位。一旦你通过这种方式施展了一道法术，直到完成一次长休前你都不能再使用这个增益。

Foundry 注

法术在添加后需要手动修改。

快速仪式行为可以用于追踪长休间的免费使用次数。

original: You’ve trained to deal particularly damaging strikes. Once per turn when you hit a target with a weapon, you can roll the weapon’s damage dice twice and use either roll against the target.
translation: 你专门训练过怎么做出更具破坏性的打击。每回合一次，当你使用武器命中目标时，你可以掷两次武器的伤害骰，并自选其中一次应用在目标上。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Strength or Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Guardian. Immediately after a creature within 5 feet of you takes the Disengage action or hits a target other than you with an attack, you can make an Opportunity Attack against that creature.

Halt. When you hit a creature with an Opportunity Attack, the creature’s Speed becomes 0 for the rest of the current turn.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which can be used for reducing the creature's Speed to 0.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你的力量或敏捷提升1，最多为20。

守护者。当位于你5尺范围内的生物执行撤离动作，或通过一次攻击命中了除你以外的目标后，你可以立刻对该生物进行一次借机攻击。

阻拦。你的借机攻击命中了一个生物时，该生物的速度在这个回合余下的阶段里降至0。

Foundry 注

此特性包含一个会让生物的速度降为0的效应。

original:
General Feat (Prerequisite: Level 4+)

Your exposure to the Shadowfell’s magic grants you the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Shadow Magic. Choose one level 1 spell from the Illusion or Necromancy school of magic. You always have that spell and the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility} spell prepared. You can cast each of these spells without expending a spell slot. Once you cast either spell in this way, you can’t cast that spell in this way again until you finish a Long Rest. You can also cast these spells using spell slots you have of the appropriate level. The spells’ spellcasting ability is the ability increased by this feat.

Foundry Note

The spells will have to be added to your sheet with those changes manually.

The Expend Chosen Spell's Use and Expend Invisibility Use can be used for tracking your free uses.
translation:
通用专长（先决：等级4+）

暴露于堕影冥界的魔法给予你以下增益：

属性值提升。你的智力、感知或魅力提升1，最多为20。

暗影魔法。你从幻术或死灵学派中选择一道一环法术，并始终准备了@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{隐形术}和所选法术。你可以在不消耗法术位的情况下施展这些法术各一次。当你以此法施展这两道法术之一后，你不能再次以此法施展那道法术，直至你完成一次长休。你也可以消耗合适的法术位来施展这些法术。这些法术的施法属性是你由此专长提升的属性。

Foundry 注

此法术在加入到你的角色卡后需要手动修改。

耗用所选法术次数 和 耗用隐形术次数可用于追踪免费使用次数。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Bypass Cover. Your ranged attacks with weapons ignore Half Cover and Three-Quarters Cover.

Firing in Melee. Being within 5 feet of an enemy doesn’t impose Disadvantage on your attack rolls with Ranged weapons.

Long Shots. Attacking at long range doesn’t impose Disadvantage on your attack rolls with Ranged weapons.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你的敏捷提升1，最多为20。

绕过掩体。你使用武器进行的远程攻击检定无视半掩护和四分之三掩护。

抵近射击。你使用远程武器进行攻击检定时，即使位于一个敌人5尺范围内也不会因此而具有劣势。

长距射击。 攻击位于最大射程中的目标不会对你使用远程武器进行的攻击检定施加劣势。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Strength score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Shield Bash. If you attack a creature within 5 feet of you as part of the Attack action and hit with a Melee weapon, you can immediately bash the target with your Shield if it’s equipped, forcing the target to make a Strength saving throw (DC 8 plus your Strength modifier and Proficiency Bonus). On a failed save, you either push the target 5 feet from you or cause it to have the &Reference[Prone] condition (your choice). You can use this benefit only once on each of your turns.

Interpose Shield. If you’re subjected to an effect that allows you to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, you can take a Reaction to take no damage if you succeed on the saving throw and are holding a Shield.

Foundry Note

The Shield Bash activity includes the save and an Active Effect which can apply the Prone condition.

The Interpose Shield activity can be used if you're tracking Reaction usage.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你的力量提升1，最多为20。

盾击。当你通过攻击动作中由近战武器发动的一次攻击，命中了位于你5尺内的生物时，如果你装备了盾牌，你就可以立即使用它来击打目标，迫使对方进行一次力量豁免检定（DC等于8+你的力量调整值+你的熟练加值）。如果豁免失败，目标将被你推离5尺远或陷入&Reference[Prone]状态（由你选择）。你只能在每个你自己的回合使用一次这个增益。

介入盾牌。当你受某效应影响而需要进行敏捷豁免来减半伤害时，如果你通过了豁免检定同时正持握着一面盾牌，你就可以执行一个反应来使你不受伤害。

Foundry 注

盾击行为包含了一个豁免骰和可以应用倒地状态的效应。

介入盾牌可以用于追踪反应消耗。

original: If you hit a creature with a Melee weapon within 5 feet of you as part of the Attack action
translation: 当你通过攻击动作中的近战武器发动的一次攻击命中了位于你5尺内的生物时

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase one ability score of your choice by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Skill Proficiency. You gain proficiency in one skill of your choice.

Expertise. Choose one skill in which you have proficiency but lack Expertise. You gain Expertise with that skill.

Foundry Note

This feature does not automatically grant the proficiency/Expertise. You can toggle the "Edit" mode for your sheet and click on the circle next to the skills to apply proficiency or Expertise as needed.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你选择一个属性提升1，最多为20。

技能熟练。你自选一个技能并获得其熟练项。

专精。你选择一个拥有其熟练项但不具备相应专精的技能，并获得其专精。

Foundry 注

此专长未提供熟练项自动化。你需要切换至角色卡的“编辑”模式，点击技能旁的圆点来应用所需的熟练和专精。

original:
You gain proficiency in any combination of three skills or tools of your choice.

Repeatable. You can take this feat more than once.

Foundry Note

This feature does not automatically grant the proficiencies. You can toggle the "Edit" mode in the "Details" tab of your sheet and click on the circles next to the Skills to choose your proficiencies.
translation:
你获得三项自选的技能或工具熟练。

复选。你可多次选择本专长。

Foundry 注

此专长未提供熟练项自动化。你需要切换至角色卡“详细”一栏的“编辑”模式，点击技能旁的圆点来应用所需的熟练和专精。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Blindsight. You have Blindsight with a range of 10 feet.

Fog of War. You exploit the distractions of battle, gaining Advantage on any Dexterity (Stealth) check you make as part of the Hide action during combat.

Sniper. If you make an attack roll while hidden and the roll misses, making the attack roll doesn’t reveal your location.

Foundry Note

This feature automatically grants the Blindsight range.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你的敏捷提升1，最多为20。

盲视。你获得10尺距离的盲视。

战争迷雾。你善于利用战斗中的混乱。你在战斗中通过执行躲藏动作所做的任何敏捷（隐匿）检定都具有优势。

狙击手。如果你在隐匿中进行了攻击检定，而该次攻击未命中时，这次攻击不会暴露你的位置。

Foundry 注

此专长自动提供盲视。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Strength or Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Hamstring. Once per turn when you hit a creature with an attack that deals Slashing damage, you can reduce the Speed of that creature by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.

Enhanced Critical. When you score a Critical Hit that deals Slashing damage to a creature, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls until the start of your next turn.

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect which can be used for tracking the Hamstring and Enhanced Critical effects. It automatically reduces the creature's speed by 10 feet.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你的力量或敏捷提升1，最多为20。

伤筋。每回合一次，当你用造成挥砍伤害的攻击命中一个生物时，你可以使其速度降低10尺，直到你的下回合开始。

强化重击。当你对一个生物打出造成挥砍伤害的重击时，该生物此后所作的攻击检定将会具有劣势，直至你的下回合开始为止。

Foundry 注

此专长包含一个可用于追踪断筋和强化重击的效应。它会自动减少目标生物10尺速度。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Dexterity or Constitution score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Speed Increase. Your &Reference[Speed] increases by 10 feet.

Dash over Difficult Terrain. When you take the Dash action on your turn, Difficult Terrain doesn’t cost you extra movement for the rest of that turn.

Agile Movement. Opportunity Attacks have Disadvantage against you.

Foundry Note

This feature automatically increases your walk movement Speed by 10 feet. If you have other movement types you will need to update them manually.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你的敏捷或体质提升1，最多为20。

速度提升。 你的&Reference[Speed]提升10尺。

险地疾行。 当你在自己的回合执行疾走动作时，在这个回合余下的阶段里，困难地形不再会额外消耗你的移动力。

灵活移动对你发动的借机攻击都具有劣势。

Foundry 注

此专长自动提升你10尺步行速度。如果 你需要提升其他类型的速度，那你需要手动修改。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Bypass Cover. Your attack rolls for spells ignore &Reference[Half Cover] and &Reference[Three-Quarters Cover].

Casting in Melee. Being within 5 feet of an enemy doesn’t impose Disadvantage on your attack rolls with spells.

Increased Range. When you cast a spell that has a range of at least 10 feet and requires you to make an attack roll, you can increase the spell’s range by 60 feet.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你的智力、感知或魅力提升1，最多为20。

绕过掩体。你为法术进行的攻击检定无视 &Reference[Half Cover] 和 &Reference[Three-Quarters Cover]。

抵近施法。你通过法术进行攻击检定时，即使位于一个敌人5尺范围内也不会因此而具有劣势。

法术增距。当你施展一个具有至少10尺射程并且需要你进行一次攻击检定的法术时，你能将这道法术的射程增长60尺。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Enhanced Unarmed Strike. When you hit with your Unarmed Strike and deal damage, you can deal Bludgeoning damage equal to 1d4 plus your Strength modifier instead of the normal damage of an Unarmed Strike.

Damage Rerolls. Whenever you roll a damage die for your Unarmed Strike, you can reroll the die if it rolls a 1, and you must use the new roll.

Improvised Weaponry. You have proficiency with improvised weapons.

Push. When you hit a creature with an Unarmed Strike as part of the Attack action on your turn, you can deal damage to the target and also push it 5 feet away from you. You can use this benefit only once per turn.

Foundry Note

The proficiency is automatically granted by this feature.

The Enhanced Unarmed Strike activity includes the damage change.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

强化徒手打击。当你使用徒手打击命中并造成伤害时，你可以造成1d4+你力量调整值的钝击伤害，而非徒手打击的原本伤害。

伤害重掷。当你为徒手打击掷伤害骰时，如果掷出1，可以再重掷一次，但你必须使用重掷的结果。

临时武器专家。你拥有临时武器的熟练项。

推离。在你的回合内，如果你用攻击动作中的一次徒手打击命中了一个生物，你可以对目标同时造成伤害并把它推离5尺。你每回合只能使用这个增益一次。

Foundry 注

熟练项已经自动化。

强化徒手打击行为包含了伤害的修改。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Minor Telekinesis. You learn the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageHand00]{Mage Hand} spell. You can cast it without Verbal or Somatic components, you can make the spectral hand Invisible, and its range and the distance it can be away from you both increase by 30 feet when you cast it. The spell’s spellcasting ability is the ability increased by this feat.

Telekinetic Shove. As a Bonus Action, you can telekinetically shove one creature you can see within 30 feet of yourself. When you do so, the target must succeed on a Strength saving throw (DC 8 plus the ability modifier of the score increased by this feat and your Proficiency Bonus) or be moved 5 feet toward or away from you.

Foundry Note

The spell will have to be added to your sheet manually with the changes.

The Telekinetic Shove activities can be used for the saving throw with the relevant Ability score.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升：你的智力、感知或魅力提升1，最多为20。

次级心灵遥控。你习得 @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplMageHand00]{法师之手}戏法，你施展它无需语言成分或材料成分，并且你可以让该幽灵手隐形，同时你施展该戏法时其距离提升30尺。该戏法的施法属性是你用此专长提升的属性。

念力推撞。以一个附赠动作，你可以尝试以念动力推撞一个位于你30尺内的你可见的生物。当你这样做时，目标必须通过一次力量豁免（DC等于8+你用此专长提升的属性的调整值+你的熟练加值）否则将被你拉近或推离5尺。

Foundry 注

法术加入你的角色卡后需要手动修改。

念力推撞行为可以用相关属性值进行豁免掷骰。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Telepathic Utterance. You can speak telepathically to any creature you can see within 60 feet of yourself. Your telepathic utterances are in a language you know, and the creature understands you only if it knows that language. Your communication doesn’t give the creature the ability to respond to you telepathically.

Detect Thoughts. You always have the @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectThou]{Detect Thoughts} spell prepared. You can cast it without a spell slot or spell components, and you must finish a Long Rest before you can cast it in this way again. You can also cast it using spell slots you have of the appropriate level. Your spellcasting ability for the spell is the ability increased by this feat.

Foundry Note

The Detect Thoughts activity can be used for tracking your free use per Long Rest. The spell will have to be added to your sheet manually though.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你的智力、感知或魅力提升1，最多为20。

心电传语。你可以和位于你60尺内任何你可见的生物用心灵感应进行交流。你的心电传语以一种你已知的语言进行，且该生物必须懂得这门语言才能理解你。你的主动沟通并未给予该生物以心灵感应的形式回复你的能力。

侦测思想。 你始终准备了@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplDetectThou]{侦测思想}法术。你可以无需法术位和法术成分地施展它。以此法施法后，你在完成一次长休前不能再这样做。该法术的施法属性是你由此专长提升的属性。你也可以消耗合适的法术位来施展这些法术。这些法术的施法属性是你由此专长提升的属性。

Foundry 注

侦测思想 行为可以用于追踪长休间的免费使用次数。法术在加入你角色卡之后需要手动修改。

original:
Your Hit Point maximum increases by an amount equal to twice your character level when you gain this feat. Whenever you gain a character level thereafter, your Hit Point maximum increases by an additional 2 Hit Points.

Foundry Note

The Hit Point maximum increase is handled automatically when you get this feat and as you level up.
translation:
获得该专长时，你的生命值上限增加你当前角色等级两倍的数值。并且在你随后每次升级时，生命值上限都会额外加2。

Foundry 注

获得专长和升级时，生命值会自动提升。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Concentration. You have Advantage on Constitution saving throws that you make to maintain Concentration.

Reactive Spell. When a creature provokes an Opportunity Attack from you by leaving your reach, you can take a Reaction to cast a spell at the creature rather than making an Opportunity Attack. The spell must have a casting time of one action and must target only that creature.

Somatic Components. You can perform the Somatic components of spells even when you have weapons or a Shield in one or both hands.

Foundry Note

This feat will automate the advantage on Concentration checks.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你的智力、感知或魅力提升1，最多为20。

专注。你用于维持专注的体质豁免具有优势。

响应法术。当一个生物因离开你的触及范围而引起你的借机攻击时，你能使用你的反应来对这个生物施展一道法术，而非发动借机攻击。这道法术的施展时间必须为一动作，且该生物必须为法术的唯一目标。

姿势成分。即使你的一只手或双手都握持了武器或盾牌，你也能进行法术的姿势成分。

Foundry 注

该专长自动使专注的体质豁免具备优势。

original:
You gain the following benefits.

Ability Score Increase. Increase your Strength or Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Mastery Property. Your training with weapons allows you to use the mastery property of one kind of Simple or Martial weapon of your choice, provided you have proficiency with it. Whenever you finish a Long Rest, you can change the kind of weapon to another eligible kind.

Foundry Note

To change your masteries toggle on the "Edit" mode of your sheet. On the "Details" tab click on the cog icon next to "Weapons" in the bottom right. You can place a check in the mastery column of your chosen weapons.
translation:
你获得以下增益：

属性值提升。你的力量或敏捷提升1，最多为20。

精通词条。你对武器的训练让你能够使用特定一种简单或军用武器的精通词条，前提是你熟练于该武器。每当你完成一次长休，你能将该种武器替换为另一种适合的武器。

Foundry 注

修改你的武器精通，请打开你角色卡的“编辑”模式，在“详细”一栏，“武器”一栏的右侧底部的齿轮图标可以修改这部分内容。勾选所选的武器精通词条即可。
